bow: one and done parents help me not feel like freak ok right off the bat have **no problem whatsoever** with how many kids people have one more none are all valid in my book this is not an attempt to bash parents of multiple kids that said am the only one among my friends and acquaintences who has chosen to stick with one and it bit isolating do know if it just where live or universal thing but my son was barely born before people were asking about when we have our next one and for while we did contemplate it but with one thing and another we ve decided that is good size for our family so one and done it is the problem is that now when get the when will you give him sibling question and say we re done get generally negative reactions people question our reasons argue with me not my husband he never gets this act like must be some frigid baby hating bitch it depressing and never know how to respond my husband makes fun of me for needing other people to validate my decisions but he also is the one with the endless why do you want another baby refrain so come to you parents of mommit do you get these questions what do you tell people **tl dr give me good come back to the nosy questions that does implicitly criticize someone else family decisions ** edit wow thank you for all the positive comments there are so many great ideas in here thank you all for your help lt my husband and are in the one and done category we re young 26 and 27 with year old little girl who is absolutely amazing we just know ourselves enough to say that one is just fine for us she is not spoiled she polite she happy as far as we are concerned financially and emotionally we are able to go above and beyond for one but would completely be off the rails with and that okay no one else has right to what you choose to do with your family what works for one family does not always work for others still get the will you try for boy are you giving your girl sibling she ll be spoiled lonely brat etc and just let it roll because there is no reason to waste energy on people so set in their ways if am faced with pushy people usually throw down simple this is how we want our family this is how we are happy and comfortable thank you for your input polite over snarky any day tends to ease people and they move on have only ever come across two people who insisted that was wrong that when replied with well too late my husband is already snipped truth if anything the awkward shuts them up honestly though all that matters is that you and your husband know what right by you make peace with that and just smile and nod when people push back because at the end of the day being self assured is the one thing people ca take from you they may not agree and they may push but if you know what going to work for your family then who cares sending strong mama vibes to you you are supported have one and want more so not the best person have suggestions though we decided that we did want to split our love and attention we are so happy with our child that we did want to risk messing up do tempt fate if applicable we wanted to put our extra money into college savings instead of expansion or we ca comfortably afford to expand our family so and so has enough friends that he is lacking did you have lot of accidents if think of any more will add them you ca expect perfection twice and walk away only have one shes utterly brilliant to explain am disabled and my husband works 12 hour sifts pregnancy did me lot of damage and serious infection near the end of my pregnancy damaged my heart my doctor said trying for another would be suicide however think wouldnt have another one even if could look after her and thats as much as can handle she is clothed fed and entertained and if had another money would be tight shes smart funny compassionate energetic thoughtful sensitive strong loud quiet clingy and anti social in all the right measures she is enough for me my reproductive plans or capabilities are really not something like to discuss this is what say personally feel it rude and insensitive to ask people about their plans to have children how do you know they are trying but having trouble or suffered recent loss or anything else that maybe they are comfortable discussing and in my book rude questions get rude answers well this is exactly what you re looking for but have two and nosy people still ask me when having third my husband and have two wonderful girls and we are happily done so everyone wants to know why we are trying for boy do want to give my husband boy does he want boy who will carry on the family name someone actually told me well as long as your husband happy so maybe there some comfort in knowing that people will question your decision even if you were to have another their rudeness has nothing to do with how many kids you have and everything to do with themselves well if husband can bear the burden better and he does care just blame him oh hubby says we re done *slight chuckle* and inclined to agree and just move on we are one and done just say had traumatic birth and difficult pregnancy ca go through that again also within reason our son will be financially fortunate as an only child more so than if he had sibling one and done here ve taken survey of parents with and concluded that is times harder than and we re *exhausted* from one just seriously fucking pooped plus he just started day care so we re also sick constantly so no regrets over here devil advocate question here is it possible that healthy portion of these people are just making conversation and trying to be part of your life do you really feel that most people who ask are truly judging you do have to answer me the questions are for yourself we are one and done and get these questions but only once have ever felt the other person was being turd blossom because she followed it up with some nonsense about how with only one never know what it feel like to be real mom what have the same problem as op will use this next time we used to think two kids would be nice now we think one kid is pretty special after you tell them we re done if they continue to badger you in any way just say please do judge me for or argue with me about my reproductive choices that extremely rude we are only having the one and he is 20 months now people who do know my situation ask if when we re having more pretty often when politely say we re not having any others often times get condescending responses like oh we said that too now we have
